title: Reduce the minim required for a proposal to pass to 30%
content:
1. PROPOSAL DETAILS

 This proposal intends to reduce the minimun required votes from a proposal to pass. 



2. ECONOMIC IMPACT - None 



3. IMPACT ON USERS - Users will have easier decission making because of the lowered threshold. 



4. EXPECTED POSITIVE IMPACT - It will be easier to take decisions, also encourage people to participate in democracy with a lower threshold. 



5. KNOWN POTENTIAL OR NEGATIVE DOWNSIDES - Lower thresholds could mean easier entrance to harmfull proposals if community do not participate actively.
